name: Enable Cheats
description: Enables access to cheat commands using the server admin password.

name: Set Cheat Player
description: Enables or disables cheats for the player who executes it.

name: Add Experience
syntax: admincheat AddExperience <Amount> <From Tribe> <Prevent Sharing With Tribe>
description: Adds experience points to the player's experience amount.

name: Allow Player To Join No Check
description: Adds a player to the server's whitelist using their numerical Steam ID.

name: Disallow Player To Join No Check
description: Removes a player from the server's whitelist using their numerical Steam ID.

name: Auto Cycle
description: Provides unlimited health for the specified duration to the player.

name: Ban Player
description: Bans a player by their Steam ID, preventing them from reconnecting.

name: Broadcast
description: Sends a message to all players currently connected to the server.

name: Change Weather
description: Changes the weather to the specified weather type.

name: Change Size
description: Changes the player's character size based on the specified multiplier.

name: Clear Player Inventory
description: Clears the inventory of the player with the specified numerical ID.

name: Clear Tutorials
description: Resets the player's tutorial position, re-enabling it from the start.

name: Debug Structures
description: Toggles the structure debug interface on or off.

name: Destroy All
description: Removes all creatures of the specified entity/creature ID.

name: Destroy All Enemies
description: Clears the map of all non-player creatures, including tamed ones.

name: Destroy My Target
description: Removes the creature, entity, or structure under the player's crosshair.

name: Destroy Structures
description: Removes all structures on the map, including player-owned ones.

name: Destroy Tribe Dinos
description: Destroys all dinos belonging to the tribe of the entity under the player's crosshair.

name: Destroy Tribe Players
description: Destroys all players in the tribe of the entity under the player's crosshair.

name: Destroy Tribe Structures
description: Destroys all structures belonging to the tribe of the entity under the player's crosshair.

name: Destroy Wild Dinos
description: Destroys all non-tamed creatures on the map.

name: Disable Spectator
description: Exits spectator mode for the player.

name: Do Exit
description: Shuts down the server at the earliest possible time.

name: Do Restart Level
description: Restarts the map.

name: Do Tame
description: Tames the creature currently under the player's crosshair, if tamable.

name: Enemy Invisible
description: Makes creatures not attack the player, even if provoked.

name: Exec Set Sleeping
description: Puts the player to sleep or wakes them up.

name: Fly
description: Enables fly mode, disabling collisions with objects.

name: Force Tame
description: Forcefully tames the creature under the player's crosshair, rideable without a saddle.

name: Force Tame AOE
description: Forcefully tames all dinos within the specified radius.

name: Force Player To Join Target Tribe
description: Sets the tribe of the specified player to that of the entity/structure under the crosshair.

name: Force Player To Join Tribe
description: Forces a player to join the specified tribe.

name: Force Tribes
syntax: admincheat ForceTribes <Player Name> <Player Name> <New Tribe Name>
description: Creates a new tribe and forces specified players to join it.

name: Game Command
description: Runs a command specific to the server's current game mode.

name: Get Chat
description: Retrieves the latest chat messages sent on the server.

name: Get All State
description: Prints information about all entities of the specified type on the map.

name: Get Game Log
description: Prints 100 entries of the game log (requires -servergamelog argument).

name: Get Player ID For Steam ID
description: Returns the player ID (UE4) for the specified Steam ID (may not work due to bugs).

name: Get Steam ID For Player ID
description: Returns the Steam ID for the specified player ID (may not work due to bugs).

name: Get Tribe ID Player List
description: Lists players in the specified tribe ID.

name: GFI
description: Adds an item to the player's inventory based on the specified blueprint or GFI code.

name: Ghost
description: Enables noclip mode, allowing the player to pass through objects.

name: Give All Structure
description: Gives ownership of the structure and connected structures under the player's crosshair.

name: Give Colors
description: Gives the player every dye in the game, with the specified amount of each.

name: Give Creative Mode
description: Sets the player's gamemode to creative mode.

name: Give Creative Mode To Target
description: Sets the gamemode of the player or entity under the crosshair to creative mode.

name: Give Creative Mode To Player
description: Sets the gamemode of the specified player to creative mode.

name: Give Engrams
description: Unlocks all crafting recipes for the player's character.

name: Give Exp To Player
syntax: admincheat GiveExpToPlayer <UE4 ID> <Amount> <From Tribe> <Prevent Sharing With Tribe>
description: Gives experience points to the specified player.

name: Give Exp To Target
syntax: admincheat GiveExpToTarget <Amount> <From Tribe> <Prevent Sharing With Tribe>
description: Gives experience points to the player or dino under the crosshair.

name: Give Infinite Stats To Target
description: Gives infinite stats to the player or dino under the crosshair.

name: Give Item
description: Adds an item to the player's inventory based on the full blueprint path.

name: Give Item Num
description: Adds an item to the player's inventory based on the numerical item ID.

name: Give Item To Player
description: Adds an item to the specified player's inventory based on the full blueprint path.

name: Give Item Num To Player
description: Adds an item to the specified player's inventory based on the numerical item ID.

name: Give Resources
description: Gives 50 of each resource to the player's inventory.

name: Give Slot Item
description: Places an item in the specified inventory slot, with extras going to inventory.

name: Give Slot Item Num
description: Places an item in the specified inventory slot based on item ID, with extras going to inventory.

name: Give To Me
description: Makes the player the owner of the entity under the crosshair (does not tame creatures).

name: GM Buff
description: Grants near unlimited experience, infinite stats, god mode, and makes creatures ignore the player.

name: GM Summon
description: Spawns a creature with the specified entity ID and level in front of the player.

name: God
description: Enables or disables god mode, making the player invincible to most damage (except drowning).

name: Hide Tutorial
description: Hides the specified tutorial (0 for Blank, 1 for Your first day).

name: Hurt Me
description: Damages the player's character by the specified amount.

name: Infinite Stats
description: Grants the player infinite health, oxygen, stamina, food, and water.

name: Kick Player
description: Kicks a player from the server by their Steam ID (does not ban).

name: Kill
description: Kills the entity or structure under the player's crosshair, leaving a corpse.

name: Kill Player
description: Kills the player with the specified player ID.

name: Kill AOE
description: Destroys all entities of the specified category within the given radius.

name: Leave Me Alone
description: Enables god mode, infinite stats, and makes creatures ignore the player.

name: List Players
description: Lists all players connected to the server with their Steam IDs.

name: Make Tribe Admin
description: Makes the player an admin of their current tribe.

name: Make Tribe Founder
description: Makes the player the founder of their current tribe.

name: On Toggle In Game Menu
description: Toggles the in-game menu.

name: Open Map
description: Loads the specified map.

name: Players Only
description: Halts creature movement and crafting (toggles on/off).

name: Print Colors
description: Prints the IDs of all colors in the game.

name: Rain Critters
description: Spawns a random selection of sheep and dodos above the player.

name: Remove Tribe Admin
description: Removes all admins (except the player) from the current tribe.

name: Rename Player
description: Changes the name of the specified player.

name: Rename Tribe
description: Changes the name of the specified tribe.

name: Request Spectator
description: Puts the player in spectator mode if the correct password is provided.

name: Save World
description: Forcefully saves the map on servers or singleplayer.

name: Script Command
description: Runs a script or command specific to the server's game mode.

name: SDF
description: Spawns a creature with a random level in front of the player.

name: Server Chat
description: Sends a message to all players on the server.

name: Server Chat To
description: Sends a private message from the server to the player with the specified Steam ID.

name: Server Chat To Player
description: Sends a private message from the server to the player with the specified name.

name: Set Admin Icon
description: Shows or hides the admin icon in the in-game chat.

name: Set Baby Age
description: Sets the age of the baby creature under the player's crosshair.

name: Set Facial Hair Percent
description: Sets the player's facial hair percentage.

name: Set Facial Hair Style
description: Sets the player's facial hair style based on the specified ID (0-7).

name: Set Global Pause
description: Pauses or unpauses the game/server completely.

name: Set God Mode
description: Enables or disables god mode, making the player invincible to most damage.

name: Set Graphics Quality
description: Sets the client's graphics quality (0-3).

name: Set Head Hair Percent
description: Sets the percentage of hair on the player's head.

name: Set Head Hair Style
description: Sets the player's hair style based on the specified ID (0-7).

name: Set Imprint Quality
description: Sets the imprint quality of the entity under the player's crosshair.

name: Set Message Of The Day
description: Sets the server's message of the day, displayed to players upon connection.

name: Set Show All Players
description: Enables or disables player names in spectator mode.

name: Set Target Dino Color
description: Sets the color of the dino region under the player's crosshair.

name: Set Target Player Body Val
description: Resizes a specific part of a character's body under the crosshair.

name: Set Target Player Color Val
description: Recolors a specific part of a character's body under the crosshair.

name: Set Player Pos
description: Teleports the player to the specified coordinates.

name: Set Time Of Day
description: Sets the time of day in the game world.

name: Show In Game Menu
description: Shows the in-game menu.

name: Show Message Of The Day
description: Displays the server's current message of the day to the player.

name: Show Tutorial
description: Shows the specified tutorial to the player.

name: Slomo
description: Sets the game speed multiplier (1 is default speed).

name: Spawn Actor
description: Spawns an entity with a random level based on the blueprint specified.

name: Spawn Actor Spread
description: Spawns multiple entities based on the blueprint within a specified radius.

name: Spawn Dino
description: Spawns a creature with the specified level and blueprint at the given offsets.

name: Suicide
description: Forcefully kills the player's character.

name: Summon
description: Spawns a creature with the specified entity ID.

name: Summon Tamed
description: Spawns a tamed creature with the specified entity ID.

name: Take All Dino
description: Transfers ownership of all dinos from the tribe under the crosshair to the player's tribe.

name: Take All Structure
description: Transfers ownership of all structures from the tribe under the crosshair to the player's tribe.

name: Teleport
description: Moves the player forward until they collide with an object.

name: Teleport Player ID To Me
description: Teleports the specified player to the player's location.

name: Teleport Player Name To Me
description: Teleports the player with the specified name to the player's location.

name: Teleport To Player
description: Teleports the player to the location of the specified player ID.

name: Test Steam Refresh Items
description: Checks if Steam can refresh items.

name: Toggle Infinite Ammo
description: Toggles unlimited ammo for the player's weapons.

name: Unban Player
description: Unbans a player from the server using their Steam ID.

name: Unlock Engram
description: Unlocks the specified Tek Engram for the player.

name: Walk
description: Deactivates fly mode, re-enabling game physics for the player.

name: Stat
description: Toggles on-screen debug information for the specified stat (FPS, Levels, Unit, UnitGraph).

name: Show Debug
description: Shows debug information overlays for the specified type (e.g., physics, camera, bones).

name: Show My Admin Manager
description: Opens the admin management interface with useful admin tools.

name: Enable Spectator
description: Enables spectator mode for the player's character.

name: Stop Spectating
description: Disables spectator mode for the player's character.

name: Toggle Gun
description: Toggles the visibility of the item in the player's hands.

name: Tribe Message
description: Sends a message to the specified tribe.

name: TP Coords
description: Teleports the player to the specified GPS coordinates.

name: SPI
description: Teleports the player to the specified coordinates with set yaw and pitch.

name: Destroy Tribe Id
description: Deletes the tribe with the specified tribe ID.

name: Destroy Tribe Id Dinos
description: Kills all dinos tamed by the tribe with the specified ID.

name: Destroy Tribe Id Players
description: Kills all players in the tribe with the specified ID.

name: Destroy Tribe Id Structures
description: Destroys all structures belonging to the tribe with the specified ID.

name: Hide Riders
description: Makes dinosaur riders invisible (requires rejoining to become visible again).

name: Refill Stats
description: Replenishes the player's health, stamina, oxygen, water, and food stats.

name: Give Armor Set
description: Equips the player with a full set of the specified armor tier and quality.

name: Give Weapon Set
description: Gives the player a set of weapons based on the specified tier and quality.

name: Give Item Set
description: Gives the player a set of items based on the specified item set number.

name: Clear My Buffs
description: Clears all status effects (buffs) from the player's character.

name: Rain Dinos
description: Spawns a random selection of trikes and parasaurs above the player.

name: Rain Danger
description: Spawns a random selection of Tyrannosauruses and Allosauruses above the player.

name: Start Nearest Horde
description: Spawns an Element Node or Orbital Supply Drop on Extinction with the specified difficulty.

name: List Active Horde Events
description: Lists all active Orbital Supply Drops and Element Nodes with their coordinates (Extinction only).

name: Toggle Damage Numbers
description: Toggles floating damage numbers on the server.

name: Hatch Egg
description: Instantly completes the incubation of the egg under the player's crosshair.

name: Tribe Structure Audit
description: Lists all structures owned by the specified tribe with their counts.

name: Tribe Dino Audit
description: Lists all dinos owned by the specified tribe with their counts.

name: Level Up
description: Levels up the specified stat for the player or ridden dinosaur.

name: Level Up AOE
description: Levels up the specified stat for all players and dinos within the given radius.

name: Level Up Target
description: Levels up the specified stat for the player or dino under the crosshair.

name: Teleport To Player Name
description: Teleports the player to the location of the specified player name.

name: Teleport To Actor Location
description: Teleports the player to the location of the specified actor ID.

name: TP
description: Teleports the player to a predefined location based on the location code.

name: Move Target To
description: Teleports the entity under the crosshair to the specified coordinates.

name: Teleport To Active Horde
description: Teleports the player to the specified horde event.

name: Force Join Tribe
description: Forces the player to join the tribe of the entity under the crosshair.

name: Take Tribe
description: Transfers all dinos and structures of the specified tribe to the player.

name: Give Engrams Tek Only
description: Unlocks all Tek Engrams for the player until they leave the server.

name: Give Tek Engrams To
description: Gives and permanently unlocks the specified Tek Engram for the specified player.

name: Player Command
description: Grants the specified Ascension effect (Gamma, Beta, or Alpha) to the player.

name: Set My Target Sleeping
description: Knocks out or wakes up the entity under the player's crosshair.

name: Max Ascend
description: Unlocks Alpha Rockwell and Alpha Overseer Ascensions for the specified player.

name: Defeat Boss
description: Defeats the specified boss for the specified player, unlocking associated Tek Engrams.

name: Defeat All Bosses
description: Defeats and unlocks all Alpha difficulty bosses for the specified player.

name: Dump Dino Stats
description: Prints all statistics and information about the dinosaur under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Set Imprinted Player
description: Changes the imprinted player for the dinosaur under the crosshair to the specified player.

name: Transfer Imprints
description: Transfers all imprinted dinos from one player to another.

name: Give Dino Set
description: Spawns a set of dinos based on the specified tier and quantity.

name: Spawn Setup Dino
syntax: admincheat SpawnSetupDino <Blueprint Path> <Blueprint Path (Saddle)> <Saddle Quality> <Level> <Stats> <Spawn Distance> <Y Offset> <Z Offset>
description: Spawns a dinosaur with the specified configuration, including saddle and stats.

name: Force Poop
description: Makes the dinosaur under the crosshair or ridden poop.

name: Clear Cryo Sickness
description: Heals Cryo Sickness of the dinosaur under the crosshair, waking it up.

name: Dino Reset
description: Resets blink cooldowns for Enforcers or fuel/heat levels for Meks under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Infinite Blink
description: Disables blink cooldowns for the Enforcer under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Set Cooldowns
description: Sets the blink cooldown slot amount for the Enforcer under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Dont Hide Rider During Blink
description: Toggles rider visibility interference during Enforcer blinks.

name: Dino Set Blink
description: Sets the forward blink percentage for the Enforcer under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Set Blink Back
description: Sets the backward blink percentage for the Enforcer under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Inflate
description: Fully inflates the Gasbag under the crosshair or ridden to maximum level.

name: Dino Set Inflate
description: Increases or decreases the Gasbag's inflation by the specified amount.

name: Dino Infinite Gas
description: Toggles infinite inflation for the Gasbag under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Infinite Fuel
description: Toggles infinite fuel for the Mek under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Set Fuel
description: Increases or decreases the fuel level of the Mek under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino No Heat
description: Toggles infinite 0% heat for the Mek under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Toggle Upkeep
description: Toggles the upkeep system (health/fuel subtraction) for the Mek under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Set Upkeep Interval
description: Sets the upkeep interval for the Mek under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Replay Intro
description: Replays the VFX intro for the Mega Mek under the crosshair.

name: Dino Set Eat Time
description: Sets the eating/digestion time for the Gacha under the crosshair or ridden.

name: Dino Destroy Right Node
description: Destroys the right arm and node of the Forest Titan under the crosshair.

name: Dino Destroy Left Node
description: Destroys the left arm and node of the Forest Titan under the crosshair.

name: Dino Destroy Center Node
description: Destroys the center node of the Forest Titan under the crosshair.

name: Copy Coords To Clipboard
description: Copies the player's X, Y, Z, Pitch, and Yaw coordinates to the clipboard.

name: Shadow Quality
description: Sets the client's shadow quality to the specified level.

name: Preview Mode
description: Switches the game to preview mode.

name: Open
description: Connects the game to the server with the specified IP, port, and optional password.

name: Add Equipment Durability
description: Adds durability to items in the player's hotbar or equipped items.

name: Get Egg
description: Spawns a fertilized egg for the dino under the crosshair, making it aggressive if picked up.

name: Set Difficulty Value
description: Sets the maximum level for wild dino spawns (use DestroyWildDinos afterward).

name: Force Give Buff
description: Forcefully enables or disables the specified buff for the player's character.

name: Set Day
description: Sets the day to the specified number in the game world.

name: Force Update Dynamic Config
description: Forcefully applies changes made to the config file.

name: Destroy Wild Dino Classes
description: Kills all wild dinos and creatures matching the specified creature ID.

name: Destroy Foliage
description: Destroys foliage and resource nodes within the specified radius, adding resources to inventory.

name: Destroy Tribe Structures Less Than
description: Destroys tribe structures with fewer than the specified connections.

name: Debug Allow VR Mission Teleport
description: Allows teleportation to the final boss in Genesis: Part 1 without completing missions.

name: Env QA
description: Runs GMBuff, stat fps, stat unit, and GiveArmorSet Tek 0 commands.

name: Give All Explorer Notes
description: Unlocks all Explorer Notes for the player (must be near notes for some).

name: Give Explorer Note
description: Unlocks the Explorer Note at the specified index.

name: Add Hexagons
description: Gives the player the specified amount of Hexagons.

name: Infinite Weight
description: Toggles infinite weight for the player's character, removing weight restrictions.

name: Set Stat On Target
description: Sets the specified stat to the specified value for the entity under the crosshair.

name: Spawn Exact Dino
syntax: admincheat SpawnExactDino <Blueprint> <Saddle Blueprint> <Saddle Quality> <Base Level> <Extra Levels> <Base Stats> <Added Stats> <Name> <Cloned> <Neutered> <Tamed Date> <Uploaded From> <Imprinter Name> <Imprinter ID> <Imprint Quality> <0> <Region Colors> <Creature ID> <Experience> <Spawn Distance> <Spawn Y> <Spawn Z>
description: Spawns a dinosaur with the specified settings (requires cryopod for full functionality).

name: Dino Titan Mode
description: Increases Gasbag inflation by 1000% (10x).

name: Print Actor Location
description: Prints the coordinates of the actor with the specified ID to the console.
